title: Corvidae Looking for D2+ TOP LANER to join OOL team
body:
Hey Summoners
 
Corvidae are making an OOL team this split and are looking for a TOP laner to join our ool team.
 
The benefits of being with corvidae is that you get to enjoy being a part of a well established organisation. Work closely alongside our amazing coach and OCS team. Our goal is is your goal. We want  to help you reach your full potential as a player and guide your development in the esports scene. 

Requirements 
-Must be D2+ 
-Working microphone 
-Be willing to improve and take feedback
-Follow the Summoner's Code
-Be able to play in OOL (When it starts it is Sat/Sun every fortnight) 
-Be able to play  in scrims during the week

Please add “Loststardust” in game and we can go from there! 

Peace 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Good news, I just hit Diamond 2 in rocket league.

> [{quoted}](name=whitePumah,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=rjB3kIFF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-14T05:38:41.766+0000)


Go join a Rocket League team if you are so good at it. Thank you summoner.
